DATASET_ADD_JOB_BTN: Run a New Topic Modelling Job
DATASET_HEADER_SUBTITLE: Run a topic modelling job to split this dataset into distinct topics.
NEW_JOB_INPUT_LABEL_MESSAGE: Give this topic modelling job a descriptive name, to distinguish it from other jobs that use the same dataset.
NEW_JOB_INPUT_DATE_RANGE_MESSAGE: Select the date range relevant to your analysis.
NEW_JOB_INPUT_LANGUAGE_MESSAGE: To guarantee sharper results, select only one language.
NEW_JOB_INPUT_MARKET_MESSAGE: We recommend selecting markets that share a common language.
NEW_JOB_CONFIRMED_MESSAGE: We’ll run the topic model on this dataset with the following parameters. Before you proceed, have a final check.
NEW_JOB_VALIDATION_LABEL_REQUIRED: Job Name is a required field
POSTS_SUB_CONTENT: Posts containing {{ keywords }} {{ postsCount }} posts ({{ percentage }}% of topic {{ topicCount }})
DATASET_EMPTY_HEADER: This dataset doesn’t have any jobs associated with it.
DATASET_EMPTY_DETAILS: Run a new topic modelling job to get started.
DATASET_EMPTY_FILTER_DETAILS: Try another search term, e.g. the client name, project name, project code, or category.
DATASET_JOB_STARTED_NOTE: You’ll be notified via Slack once this job is ready to view.
DATASET_JOB_PENDING_NOTE: You’ll be notified via Slack once this job is ready to view.
DATASET_JOB_FAILED_NOTE: Something went wrong. Try running the model again.
DATASET_SLACK_JOIN_MESSAGE: Join #discovery-notifs on Slack to be notified when your topic modelling job is ready to view.
DATASET_JOB_CREATED_MESSAGE: Your topic modelling job is queued
DATASET_404_DETAILS: Try using another one on the <link>Datasets Page</link>.
DATASET_NOT_SUCCESS_STATUS: You can’t start topic modelling while this dataset's upload status is
DATASET_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE_RUN_DISABLED: You can’t start topic modelling until the dataset has finished uploading
